description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Race against time and hungry aliens in this highly polished retro-inspired grid puzzle game.   You are in deep space, and nasty one-eyed tentacle toting aliens have broken your spaceship. You control Robert the maintenance robot and your quest is to repair the ship, one section at a time! Ubergridder updated: now contains bonus pickups, extra lives, and two game modes!
description.short: Race against time and hungry aliens in this highly polished retro-inspired grid puzzle game.   You are in deep space, and nasty one-eyed tentacle toting aliens have broken your spaceship. You control Robert the maintenance robot and your quest is to repair the ship, one section at a time! Ubergridder updated: now contains bonus pickups, extra lives, and two game modes!
